eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.xml.typesystem

Class XSerializables

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.xml.typesystem.XSerializables

  • public final class XSerializables
extends Object
    Utility classes to handle XSerializable object creation and conversion.
    Author:
    karnokd, 2011.09.29.
